title: Baden-Württemberg State Election 2026
subtitle: Practice the state election – interactive & easy to understand
whoCanVoteValue: German citizens aged 16+ with at least 3 months residency in Baden-Württemberg.
disclaimer: This is a private information project and is not affiliated with the state of Baden-Württemberg or the state election authority. All information without guarantee.
erststimmeDesc: Choose a candidate from your constituency
